subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Though the results of an M.R.I. on Jozy Altidore’s left leg were not released, even the U.S. team’s typically optimistic coach, Jurgen Klinsmann, acknowledged that the injury seemed significant.
snippet: Though the results of an M.R.I. on Jozy Altidore’s left leg were not released, even the U.S. team’s typically optimistic coach, Jurgen Klinsmann, acknowledged that the injury seemed significant.
